lead_paragraph: George Hincapie emerged from a group of 12 riders with a late surge to win the second stage and move into the lead of the Tour of Missouri. Hincapie, who rides for the Discovery Channel team, won the 125.6-mile road race from Clinton to Springfield in 4 hours 35 minutes 26 seconds.
